bibl.bibl: Baranoff, W. and Koch, Heinrich. 1871. Die Abstammung des Menschengeschlechts und damit zusammenhängen Fragen. Blätter des Psychologischen Vereins zu Dresden, 27 October 1871, pp. 73–87, 10 November 1871, pp. 89–103, 31 December 1871, pp. 105–16.
bibl.idno: DAR Pam R177. NB the second two parts are folded inside the first. 1st part has English postmark NO 20 71. Very lightly annotated: some marginal pencil strokes only.
